subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby and Marian Hossa each had a goal and an assist in the third period Monday night, when the Pittsburgh Penguins scored three times to break open a tie game in a 4-1 victory.
snippet: Sidney Crosby and Marian Hossa each had a goal and an assist in the third period Monday night, when the Pittsburgh Penguins scored three times to break open a tie game in a 4-1 victory.
